                                     java.lang.Object[] aValues,
                                     java.lang.String aFailureMessage)
Helper function to validate that a number is greater than the low limit value.

Parameters:
aErrors - the errors object to populate
aNumber - the number to check
aLowLimit - the low limit
aErrorCode - the error code to use
aValues - the values to set in the error message
aFailureMessage - the default error message

aValues - the list of values to replace in the i8n messages
aFailureMessage - the default failure message

validateRegEx

                                 java.lang.String aValue,
                                 java.lang.String aRegEx,
                                 java.lang.String aErrorCode,
                                 java.lang.Object[] aValues,
                                 java.lang.String aFailureMessage)
Helper method to validate the specified string does not contain anything other than that specified by the regular expression

Parameters:
aErrors - The errors object to populate
aValue - the string to check
aRegEx - the Perl based regular expression to check the value against
aErrorCode - the error code for getting the i8n failure message
aValues - the list of values to replace in the i8n messages
aFailureMessage - the default error message
